Class SpellCheckTokenizer

java.lang.Object
ca.cgjennings.ui.text.Tokenizer

ca.cgjennings.spelling.ui.SpellCheckTokenizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<WordTokenizer.WordResult>
public class SpellCheckTokenizer extends WordTokenizer
A Tokenizer implementation that outputs spelling error tokens.
